channel.title: Problems adding npc's
channel.description:
I'm trying to add Verac the Defiled (item2030) & Torag the Corrupted (item 2029) to Varroc square. I've entered all the correct x & y cords etc but they still won't show in Varrock square.
When I look for the npc's id in item.cfg I can't find them listed but they do show in autospawn. I've managed to add other npc's to Varroc Square with no problems.
Any ideas please.

item.title: Problems adding npc's
item.dc:creator: @propabad propabad
item.description:
@propabad wrote:

what i did is i copied another npc in my autospawn.cfg at the top then just changed the numbers around (the npc id the coords and the description i just called it varrock)[br][size=1]Posted at: December 01, 2006, 10:33:34 AM[/size][hr]or paste this into your autospawn.cfg

spawn = 2029 3218 3423 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock spawn = 2030 3211 3425 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock

Read full topic

item.title: Problems adding npc's

item.description:
